titles.title: To authorize the award of the Distinguished Service Cross to Robert L. Towles for acts of valor during the Vietnam War.
To authorize the award of the Distinguished Service Cross to Robert L. Towles for acts of valor during the Vietnam War.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to award the Distinguished Service Cross to Robert L. Towles for acts of valor during the Vietnam War, notwithstanding otherwise applicable time limitations.
